Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET2 WHERE H2VACODI = :H2VACODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL

INSERT INTO CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET2 ( H2VADET2CODI, H2VACODI, DATACATCODI, ENELABORACION, PRESENTADO, ENTRAMITE, APROBADO, FIRMADO, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :H2VADET2CODI, :H2VACODI, :DATACATCODI, :ENELABORACION, :PRESENTADO, :ENTRAMITE, :APROBADO, :FIRMADO, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET2 SET DATACATCODI = :DATACATCODI, ENELABORACION = :ENELABORACION, PRESENTADO = :PRESENTADO, ENTRAMITE = :ENTRAMITE, APROBADO = :APROBADO, FIRMADO = :FIRMADO, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE H2VADET2CODI = :H2VADET2CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET2 ORDER BY H2VADET2CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET2 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE H2VACODI = (SELECT H2VACODI FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VA WHERE PROYCODI= :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = 0) AND IND_DEL = 0
SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VADET2 WHERE H2VACODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
